subject: Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis
Sports Injuries
Brain
Concussions
lead_paragraph: A study suggests that head trauma can cause degenerative diseases similar to A.L.S. and that Lou Gehrig may not have had Lou Gehrig’s disease.
snippet: A study suggests that head trauma can cause degenerative diseases similar to A.L.S. and that Lou Gehrig may not have had Lou Gehrig’s disease.
